items.sentence: Whatever you do, don\'t tell Tom you\'re going to do it.
Don\'t act like you don\'t know what I\'m talking about.
You ought to let Tom know that you\'ll probably do that.
You should tell Tom that Mary isn\'t likely to be there.
How old were you when you first started studying French?
I climbed Mt. Fuji last summer with three of my friends.
The doctor says you must be careful to avoid excitement.
The doctor told Tom that he only had six months to live.
The factory where Tom used to work has been closed down.
The girl over there waiting for Tom is a friend of mine.
